name: WinegardRVHaloSkill
0:
”Alexa, ask RV Halo what is the weather at my property?”
”Alexa, ask RV Halo how much data is remaining?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: r. v. halo
Developer Terms of Use
des: Users who enable this skill will have access to the devices associated with their RV Halo application. Once the account is linked with Amazon login, the user can request notifications, data usage, and current weather at any of their properties. When users opt into Alexa notifications through the RV Halo application, they can request their notifications be read to them through their Alexa devices. Additionally, users who have enabled Alexa event notification permissions will receive AVS notifications to their Alexa devices in real time.
